Articles.Content:
Some of you may have seen my thread of failing landing mk3 planes because of the very weak joints. I have perfected the art of airliner landing. I am SO glad I did not have to resort to using lots of struts or COMPLEETLEY resort to the MK 2 program. Launch was as usual. Pull up. The 747 took up half the runway. Then flew high and turned left. Until about 1000 feet, I pulled up. I made it so the altitude went down 1 every 5 seconds. It landed with a soft bump.

Though my flying caused some of it most of it was caused by some overpowered engines, using the turbo jets. I replaced them with the smaller ones. I also landed the A380 but it crashed into the hills. Lesson of the day. Airbrakes are your friend!
